General.Name: LONGTU KOREA Inc
General.Description: LONGTU KOREA Inc. provides online education. The company also provides online gaming and business-to-business (B2B) content provision businesses in South Korea. The company was formerly known as Digital On Net Co. Ltd. and changed its name to LONGTU KOREA Inc. in March 2015. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: IT Castle 2 Cha, Seoul, South Korea
